items.content_html: This simple yet engaging project lets you play against a computer opponent. - Randomized computer choices for a fair challenge. - Lightweight and responsive design. Get ready to relive the timeless fun of Rock, Paper, Scissors with a modern twist. Have fun and may the best hand win!
items.title: ak-boateng/rock-paper-scissors: This simple yet engaging project lets you play against a computer opponent.   - Randomized computer choices for a fair challenge. - Lightweight and responsive design. Get ready to relive the timeless fun of Rock, Paper, Scissors with a modern twist. Have fun and may the best hand win!
